name: Autumn Glow
description:
Cycle home at the end of the day listening to soothing lo-fi music in this cozy little ambient game.

Controls:

A-D  -  Steer

W-S  -  Pedal

Mouse  -  Look Around

Escape  -  Quit

WARNING: IN RARE OCCASIONS THE PLAYER CAN FALL OVER. IF THIS HAPPENED DON'T BLAME HER SHE'S TRYING HER BEST, SIMPLY QUIT THE GAME AND RELOAD IT. THANKS A BUNCH.
